detaileddescription.para: Service request generated for aux filter for every new result
Service request generated for alternate source
Service request generated for aux filter if result is inside boundary
Service request generated for aux filter if result is outside boundary
Enumerates the service request generation mode for auxiliary filter. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_AUX_EVENT_t for this enum. Note: This is combined ENUM for SRGA + ESEL bit fields

Enumerates the divider factor for modulator clock (fMOD). Use divider factor to derive modulator clock frequency(fMOD), from the selected internal clock source(fCLK). Use type XMC_DSD_CH_CLK_t for this enum.
Enumerates the sample clock source select. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_CLOCK_SOURCE_t for this enum.
External source, from input A, direct
External source, from input A, inverted
External source, from input B, direct
External source, from input B, inverted
Enumerates the input data source select. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_DATA_SOURCE_t for this enum.
Enumerates the CIC(cyclic integrating comb) filter type. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_FILTER_TYPE_t for this enum.
Enumerates the channel run control bit register value in global run control register. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_ID_t for this enum.
Trigger event upon a falling edge
Trigger event upon a rising edge
No trigger, integrator active all the time
Enumerates the integrator trigger mode. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_INTEGRATOR_START_t for this enum.
Integration stopped upon the inverse trigger event
Integration enabled upon the defined trigger event.
Enumerates the integration enable. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_INTEGRATOR_STOP_t for this enum.
Enable service request for each new result value
Enumerates the service request generation for main chain filter. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_RESULT_EVENT_t for this enum.
Carrier is generated internally by DSD
Carrier sign signal is generated internally by next channel
Carrier is generated externally, External sign signal A
Carrier is generated externally, External sign signal B
Enumerates the carrier generation mode. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_SIGN_SOURCE_t for this enum.
Enumerates the data strobe generation Mode. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_STROBE_t for this enum.
Trigger event upon a falling edge
Trigger event upon a rising edge
Trigger event upon both the edge
Enumerates the timestamp trigger mode. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_TIMESTAMP_TRIGGER_t for this enum.
Enumerates the trigger signal. Use type XMC_DSD_CH_TRIGGER_SOURCE_t for this enum.

Enumerates the divider factor for the PWM pattern signal generator. Use divider factor to derive input frequency of the carrier signal generator(fCG), from the selected internal clock source(fCLK). Use type XMC_DSD_GENERATOR_CLKDIV_t for this enum.
Enumerates the carrier generator operating mode. Use type XMC_DSD_GENERATOR_MODE_t for this enum.
Return types of the API's.Use type XMC_DSD_STATUS_t for this enum.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API disable the auxiliary filter service request generation for this channel. Clear the bit fields SRGA and ESEL of register FCFGA.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
to select the type of event which will be enabled of type XMC_DSD_CH_AUX_EVENT_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API enable the service request generation for this channel. Result events are generated at the output rate of the configured auxiliary filter chain. Configure bit field SRGA and ESEL of register FCFGA

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
Pointer to an instance of data structure of type XMC_DSD_CH_AUX_FILTER_CONFIG_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API initialize auxiliary filter module with init. The auxiliary Filter is mainly used as fast filter. Adding the auxiliary filter to the system structure helps by defining the boundaries and filter configurations.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: It is internally called by XMC_DSD_CH_Init().

memberdef.argsstring: (XMC_DSD_CH_t *const channel, const int16_t lower_boundary, const int16_t upper_boundary)
memberdef.name: XMC_DSD_CH_AuxFilter_SetBoundary

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
lower boundary value for limit checking
upper boundary value for limit checking

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Invoke this API, to set the lower and upper boundary for limit checking for this channel. This (twos complement) value is compared to the results of the parallel filter. Configure bit fields BOUNDARYU and BOUNDARYL of register BOUNDSEL.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: Lower and upper boundaries are internally configured by function XMC_DSD_CH_AuxFilter_Init().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
Captured value

simplesect.para: uint8_t

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API, capture sign delay value for DSD channel. Captured value indicates the values counted between the begin of the positive halfwave of the carrier signal and the first received positive value. Read bit field SDCAP of register CGSYNC

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
pointer point to the address of 16 bit variable

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Returns the result of most recent conversion associated with this channel. A call to this API would access the register bit field RESMx.RESULT (x = 0 - 3).

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
pointer point to the address of 16 bit variable

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Returns the most recent conversion result values of the auxiliary filter associated with this channel. A call to this API would access the register bit field RESAx.RESULT (x = 0 - 3).

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
pointer point to the address of 16 bit variable holds result value
pointer point to the address of 8 bit variable holds decimation counter value
pointer point to the address of 8 bit integration counter variable holds value

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: API to get the result of the last conversion associated with this channel with CIC filter decimation counter and number of values counted. A call to this API would access the register bit field TSTMPx.RESULT TSTMPx.CFMDCNT and TSTMPx.NVALCNT where (x = 0 - 3).

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_CH_GetResult(),XMC_DSD_CH_GetResult_TS_Time()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
pointer point to the address of 16 bit variable holds result value
pointer point to the address of 32 bit variable holds the time

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: API to get the result of the last conversion with the time, associated with this channel.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_CH_GetResult(),XMC_DSD_CH_GetResult_TS()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
Pointer to an instance of data structure of type XMC_DSD_CH_CONFIG_t

simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_STATUS_t if success Returns XMC_DSD_STATUS_OK else return XMC_DSD_STATUS_ERROR.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initialize main filter,auxiliary filter,integrator, rectifier and timestamp of DSD module with init. Internally this API invoke main filter, auxiliary filter, integrator, rectifier and timestamp init API.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_CH_MainFilter_Init(),XMC_DSD_CH_AuxFilter_Init(),XMC_DSD_CH_Integrator_Init(), XMC_DSD_CH_Rectify_Init(),XMC_DSD_CH_Timestamp_Init()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
Pointer to an instance of data structure of type XMC_DSD_CH_INTEGRATOR_CONFIG_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initialize integrator of DSD module.The integrator is mainly used for resolver feedback but can also be used for high accurate measurement. This API configures number of integration loops, number of results are discarded before integration starts, integrator stop condition, number of integrator loop to get integration result and trigger mode.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: Trigger source for timestamp and integrator are shared. It is internally called by XMC_DSD_CH_Init().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API disable the service request generation for result of this channel. Configure bit field SRGM of register FCFGC

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API enable the service request generation for result of this channel. Result events are generated at the output rate of the configured main filter chain. Configure bit field SRGM of register FCFGC

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
Pointer to an instance of data structure of type XMC_DSD_CH_FILTER_CONFIG_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API initialize main filter module with init. The filter demodulates the incoming bit stream from the delta sigma modulator to a 16 bit result.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: It is internally called by XMC_DSD_CH_Init().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
Signed Offset value to be set

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: API set the signed offset value for this channel. This offset value is subtracted from each result before being written to the corresponding result register RESMx.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: The offset value is measured for each channel separately.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
Pointer to an instance of data structure of type XMC_DSD_CH_RECTIFY_CONFIG_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initialize rectification for this channel. In a resolver feedback system, rectifier is used to rectify the result from the integrator. Configure bit field RFEN and SSRC of register RECTCFG. Also configure sign delay value for positive halfwave(SDPOS) and negative halfwave(SDNEG).

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: For the operational capability of rectifier the filter and the integrator is mandatory. It is internally called by XMC_DSD_CH_Init().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD channel of type XMC_DSD_CH_t
Pointer to an instance of data structure of type XMC_DSD_CH_TIMESTAMP_CONFIG_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Initialize timestamp mode of DSD module with init. Configures bits TRSEL and TSTRMODE of register DICFG .

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: Trigger source for timestamp and integrator are shared. It is internally called by XMC_DSD_CH_Init().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Channel number register value of type XMC_DSD_CH_ID_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Clear the result event flag. Set bit fields ALECx of register EVFLAGCLR.Clearing these bits has no effect.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: API call for channel-0 : XMC_DSD_ClearResultEventFlag(DSD,(uint32_t)XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0); API call for channel-0 and 1: XMC_DSD_ClearResultEventFlag(DSD,(uint32_t)(XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_1));

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Channel number register value of type XMC_DSD_CH_ID_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Clear the result event flag. Set bit fields RESECx of register EVFLAGCLR.Clearing these bits has no effect.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: API call for channel-0 : XMC_DSD_ClearResultEventFlag(DSD,(uint32_t)XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0); API call for channel-0 and 1: XMC_DSD_ClearResultEventFlag(DSD,(uint32_t)(XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_1));

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Asserts the DSD module into reset. Configures PRSET0 register's DSDRS bit field. If running on XMC44/XMC48 device then it will gate the peripheral clock.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stop the module clock and disable internal module clock for DSD. Configures bit field MCSEL of register GLOBCFG and bit field DISR of register CLC.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: De-asserts the DSD module from reset. Configures PRCLR0 register's DSDRS bit field. If running on XMC44/XMC48 device then it will ungate the peripheral clock.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: It is internally called by XMC_DSD_Init().

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_Disable(),XMC_DSD_Init()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Enable the module clock and internal module clock for DSD. Configures bit field MCSEL of register GLOBCFG and bit field DISR of register CLC.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: It is internally called by XMC_DSD_Init().

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_DisableClock(),XMC_DSD_Init()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Pointer to an instance of data structure of type XMC_DSD_GENERATOR_CONFIG_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This API initialize generator module with init, to generate a wave for a resolver. Three types of waveforms can be generated: Rectangle, Triangle and Sine.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Pointer to an instance of data structure of type XMC_DSD_GENERATOR_CONFIG_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Start carrier generator by configuring operating mode. Configures bit field CGMOD of register CGCFG.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stop carrier generator by configuring operating mode. Reset bit field CGMOD of register CGCFG.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: Stopping the carrier generator terminates the PWM output after completion of the current period.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Enable the DSD module and clock.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: This is the first API which application must invoke to configure DSD.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_Enable(),XMC_DSD_EnableClock()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Channel run control bit register value of type XMC_DSD_CH_ID_t

simplesect.para: bool Return 1 if started else 0.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Find out if particular demodulator channel is started or not.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_Start(),XMC_DSD_Stop()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t

simplesect.para: bool Return 1 if success else 0.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Find out if the DSD reset is asserted. Read PRSTAT0 register's DSDRS bit field.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Channel number register value of type XMC_DSD_CH_ID_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Set the alarm event flag. Set bit fields ALEVx of register EVFLAG.Clearing these bits has no effect.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: API call for channel-0 : XMC_DSD_SetAlarmEventFlag(DSD,(uint32_t)XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0); API call for channel-0 and 1: XMC_DSD_SetAlarmEventFlag(DSD,(uint32_t)(XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_1));

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Channel number register value of type XMC_DSD_CH_ID_t

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Set the result event flag and trigger the corresponding event. Set bit fields RESEVx of register EVFLAG.Clearing these bits has no effect.

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: API call for channel-0 : XMC_DSD_SetResultEventFlag(DSD,(uint32_t)XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0); API call for channel-0 and 1: XMC_DSD_SetResultEventFlag(DSD,(uint32_t)(XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_1));

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Channel run control bit register value

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Start demodulator channel by enabling run control bit. Multiple channel can be start at a time. For an example: To start all four channel, call this function as XMC_DSD_Start(DSD,(uint32_t)(XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_1|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_2|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_3));

simplesect.title: Note
simplesect.para: All filter blocks are cleared when CHxRUN is set.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_Stop(),XMC_DSD_IsChannelStarted()

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an instance of DSD module of type XMC_DSD_t
Channel run control bit register value

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Stop demodulator channel by resetting run control bit. Multiple channel can be stop at a time. For an example: To stop all four channel, call this function as XMC_DSD_Stop(DSD,(uint32_t)(XMC_DSD_CH_ID_0|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_1|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_2|XMC_DSD_CH_ID_3));

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_DSD_Start(),XMC_DSD_IsChannelStarted()

briefdescription.para: Delta Sigma Demodulator (DSD) driver for the XMC4500, XMC4400 and XMC4800 microcontroller family

detaileddescription.para: The DSD unit provides a series of digital input channels accepting data streams from external modulators using the Delta/Sigma (DS) conversion principle. The on-chip demodulator channels convert these inputs to discrete digital values. DSD unit can be used for isolated current/voltage measurement and for sensor interfaces.

Driver is divided in six DSD functional blocks -
Main Filter (APIs prefixed with XMC_DSD_CH_MainFilter),
Aux Filter (APIs prefixed with XMC_DSD_CH_AuxFilter),
Integrator (APIs prefixed with XMC_DSD_CH_Integrator),
Timestamp (APIs prefixed with XMC_DSD_CH_Timestamp),
Rectification (APIs prefixed with XMC_DSD_CH_Rectify),
Carrier Generator (APIs prefixed with XMC_DSD_Generator)

DSD driver features:
DSD channel Configuration structure XMC_DSD_CH_CONFIG_t initialization function XMC_DSD_CH_Init() to configure all the functional blocks (except carrier generator)
Configuration structure XMC_DSD_GENERATOR_CONFIG_t and initialization function XMC_DSD_Generator_Init() to configure carrier generator
Configuration structure XMC_DSD_CH_FILTER_CONFIG_t and initialization function XMC_DSD_CH_MainFilter_Init() to configure main filter
Configuration structure XMC_DSD_CH_AUX_FILTER_CONFIG_t and initialization function XMC_DSD_CH_AuxFilter_Init() to configure auxilary filter
Configuration structure XMC_DSD_CH_INTEGRATOR_CONFIG_t and initialization function XMC_DSD_CH_Integrator_Init() to configure integrator
Configuration structure XMC_DSD_CH_TIMESTAMP_CONFIG_t and initialization function XMC_DSD_CH_Timestamp_Init() to configure timestamp
Configuration structure XMC_DSD_CH_RECTIFY_CONFIG_t and initialization function XMC_DSD_CH_Rectify_Init() to configure rectifier
